Let's rock!

I'm glad to meet new people no matter the reason: visiting your organisation, joining a meetup or discuss web development. Leave me a message or ping me on any social network.

Kudo Wizards

10 Mar 2014

I’m not going to say that a team is the most important thing in any startup. I simply do not lead any startup to say so :). I’m not going to say that our team is the most critical thing for Kudobox success. We are not succeed yet and I cannot predict the future.

I say our team is the most important thing for Kudobox right now, at this moment. Meet an awesome Kudobox team!

Being an excellent QA person, Regina decided to make a U-turn in her life and became a UX professional. She started her journey about 1,5 years ago and achieved impressive results. Now she's a freelancer as she's too lazy to waste 2 hours for commuting. Regina is crazy about pug dogs, sun, good beer and beautiful products.
[social_icons]
[social_icon type="behance" url="https://www.behance.net/rinask"]
[social_icon type="twitter" url="http://twitter.com/RShooliganka"]
[social_icon type="linkedin" url="http://ru.linkedin.com/pub/regina-siminderova/35/912/193"]
[/social_icons]

 

Alexander is all about sports: football, snowboarding, paintball. These days he's practicing the most challenging kind of activity - baby sitting with his little son Timofei. He's an excellent frontend developer and uses his talents creating one of the major products at Yandex.
[social_icons]
[social_icon type="github" url="https://github.com/azbykov"]
[social_icon type="twitter" url="http://twitter.com/azbykov"]
[social_icon type="linkedin" url="http://ru.linkedin.com/pub/alexandr-bykov/30/649/716"]
[/social_icons]

 

Every developer should be a product designer is an Alexander's point of view and a way he makes awesome products. Being a mix of healthy scepticism, passion and ultimate development skills, he's an amazing person to work with on a product with a purpose.
[social_icons]
[social_icon type="github" url="https://github.com/lltwox"]
[social_icon type="twitter" url="http://twitter.com/lltwox"]
[social_icon type="linkedin" url="http://ru.linkedin.com/pub/alexander-golubev/37/79a/a32"]

[/social_icons]

 

Sergey helps creative workers to be happy at work and persuades others to join him on this road. He loves reading, playing table games and developing web products which change people's lives. He leads a Kudobox team through caring and is happy to see their smiling faces.
